[vc_row][vc_column]

PET Can

[vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″]

→ Brief Introduction

[vc_column_text]PET Can is getting more popular recently, due to the property of the PET, the stretch blow molded can has some advantage of less production cost, transparent body, and long shelf life. In the market, beverage producer tend to using PET can for the colorful liquid.

WASHUN provide two type of PET can solution, the one is with the cutter, the procedure is blow molding the preformed bottle first, then cut the top part out to forming the PET Can shape. Another method is blow molding the PET can directly from the special made the PET preforms. Those two PET can systems can meet with different requirements.[/vc_column_text]

Applications
CSD, Juice, beer, colorful beverage…
Advantages
Less production cost, transparent body shape
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”4365″ img_size=”full”][vc_column_text]

PET Can Samples

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]WASHUN Machinery, the Professional blow molding equipments supplier in China.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

→ Related Blow Molding Machines:

[vc_column_text]Directly from the PET preform to the Can
– MG-SS Stretch blow molding machine
By cutting machine method
– MG-SS Stretch blow molding machine 
– MG-E Stretch blow molding machine
– RB Rotary Stretch blow molding machine
– EB Electric Stretch blow molding machine[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
